sentences.en: Button icons, a default button, HTML in a button, and button mnemonics.
sentences.cn: 按钮图标, 默认按钮, HTML格式的按钮, 按钮助记符.

sentences.en: Make it easier to pull facts and concepts out of your memory with the help of tricks such as mnemonics—which can be a sentence or phrase in which the first letter of the words joggles the memory.
sentences.cn: 借助一些技巧，如记忆法，将大大简化把一些事实和概念抽出大脑的过程。 它可以是一个句子或一个词组，这些词的第一个字母能唤起你的记忆。
访问键不是可有可无的,而是必须要有的.

sentences.en: Mnemonics is important in learning English.
sentences.cn: 记忆术对学英语很重要。

sentences.en: Reduce the amount of information you need to store by utilizing grouping , mnemonics, or acronyms.
sentences.cn: 使用归类 、 记法或者首字母缩拼词等方法减少你的信息存储量.

sentences.en: Research shows mnemonics plays a primary role in knowledge acquisition, especially in language learning.
sentences.cn: 研究表明记忆方法在获患上知识过程中起着重要作用, 尤其在语言进修方面.

sentences.en: Soon, assembly language was invented. It maps machine instructions to human - readable mnemonics, as ADD and MOV.
sentences.cn: 不久, 汇编语言发明了,它是把机器指令变换成易于阅读的助记符, 如ADD、MOV等.

sentences.en: When encountering information such as this, your goal should be to compress it. Find ways to group information into smaller chunks of memory through pictures or mnemonics.
sentences.cn: 当你遇到类似问题的时候，你应该采用压缩的方法，找出一种方法把他们分类成一些小组，然后通过图片或者联想的方式辅助记忆。

sentences.en: Yet mnemonics is largely ignored in language learning materials and language teaching manuals.
sentences.cn: 然而,外语教材和语言教学手册多对此视若无睹.

words.tran_cn: 记忆的；助记的；记忆术的

trans.tran_cn: 记忆术，记忆法，记忆的，记忆术的( mnemonic的名词复数 )，助记术
trans.tran_en: the art or practice of improving or of aiding the memory
